Key:
(I waited in front of the school gates, and heard the
bell finally ring. After a little while, she arrived.)
Heeey, Kotori.
Shido?

What's the matter? Aren't you supposed to be in
school?

Oh, it ended early so I came to pick you up. What's up
with that reaction? You sound like a mom who's just
seen her son up to no good.

You know, it's common nowadays to call the cops on a
person waiting for a girl at the gates of a school.
Yeah, the world has become a terrible place.

We seem to have the same thoughts for the first time
in a while.
So, did you just come to pick me up?
Yeah?
All the way here?

I mean, it's not that far away. I didn't have anything
better to do.

You always come pick me up. I figured I could return
the favor once in a while.

(Kotori's usually the one who waits for me to get out.
If I could use her words, she comes all the way to my
school.)

(As I was thinking about how much I appreciated it,
Kotori gave me a mean smirk.)

What? Shido, you wanted to see me that badly? You
could've waited for me at home and I would've
eventually been there.
Well, that's not the... Well, I guess you're right.

Gosh. You're so wishy-washy. That's gonna be a real
turn-off for people.

(The way she says it sounds like Kotori picks me up
because she wants to see me right away. But is that
okay?)
Just kidding. Thanks for picking me up.

(And here she is, suddenly smiling and being adorable.
She was just toying with me. I fell silent.)

Oh, did that make you mad? Sorry about that. I'm
really happy you came.

(Kotori rushed to explain herself. When she put it
that way, how could I complain?)

(Gosh, she turns so modest out of the blue. That's so
unfair.)

Well, how did you expect me to react? I'm allowed to
tease you, you know?
Do you mean, as my brother? Or...
As... a boyfriend?

(She whispered in my ear, and my heart skipped a
beat.)
The latter.

(There was a pause, but this time I was able to say it
clearly... But it got me embarrassed.)
I see. Hehe.

(Kotori gave a small smile. She should have just been
honest and said that she was happy to see me.)
(But I guess her not doing so makes her cute.)
Oh, Kotori-chan. Bye-byeeee!
See you tomorrow!
Bye, guys.
Your friends?
Yes. They're nice to me.
That's cool. I should thank them someday.

Why are you acting like my guardian? Suddenly such an
important man...
Anyways, let's go home.
(Kotori offered her hand and I naturally took it.)
Hey, Shido? I have homework, so help tutor me later.
There's nothing for me to tutor you in.

"Gosh, where's your fighting spirit? Can't you say,
Leave it to me. I can even factorize the formula of
love for you," or something?
"Leave it to me. I can even factorize the formula of\nlove for you." That doesn't even make sense...
You don't have to say that. That's not romantic.
Is that so?
(We were chatting as usual as we headed home.)
Hmm. Should I choose pink? Or light blue?
Hey, Shido? Shido, which do you think is better?
Hm? Either or―

―is fine, right? If you say that... You know what I'm
going to do to you, don't you?

(Kotori smiled as she held the pink and blue
scrunchies.)

(That's right. I'm not allowed to say "either or
during a date. Those were the basics that Kotori
instilled in me.)"
(I coughed and then made my choice.)

Why don't you go with pink? That's a pretty normal
color.
Pink... Pink, huh? Hehehe.

Kotori. You don't have many things in that color. I
think it's fine from time to time.
You're right. If you say so, Shido.
(Kotori put on the pink scrunchie and posed.)
Hehe. What do you think? Do I look good?
Oh, I think it's fine.

Gosh, that's not good enough, Shido. You have to tell
me if I look good in it.
It looks good. And...
And...
It looks good... and what, Shido?
...You look cute.
Heheh.

(Kotori seems happy that she was able to get the
word she was looking for. I scratched my cheek,
embarrassed.)

(Kotori wouldn't let me go unless I said that much.
But whatever, she looks happy, so that's all that
matters.)
Oh, Kotori-chan?
Oh, you're right. Heeey.
Oh.

(We looked for the voice and saw two girls around her
age.)
Huh? Weren't you at the school gate?

Oh yeah, I remember. The brother that came to pick up
Kotori-chan!
Oh, it's you guys.

(They were the friends that passed by when I went
to go pick up Kotori. If they go to the same school as
Kotori, they must live in Tengu City, too.)
(It makes sense that they'd be shopping around here.)

Hey, wait. Shopping, just the two of you? Isn't that
like a date?
Wait, what? Is that it, Kotori-chan? Is this a date?
Wha―?! U-Um, er...

(Kotori turned bright red when they asked her
directly.)

Y-Yeah. His name is Shido and he's my br... I mean,
um...
M-My boyfriend...
What? What did you say?
B-Boyfriend! BOYFRIEND!
AHhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhh!

(The girls squealed and my eardrums felt like they
were going to explode. Kotori's friends held each
other's hands and screamed.)
Did you hear that?! Boyfriend!
Wow, a real one?! I never knew they existed.
M-May I touch you?
Huh? Sure, I guess.

(I impulsively responded and their hands reached out,
touching all over my body.)
WOOOOOOOW!
A real one! A real one!
I felt his body! It wasn't all in my head!
What do you mean?!

(Kotori yelled in protest, but the two continued to
touch my body. And each time they'd squeal.)

(G-Gosh, they're loud. These girls are so hyper
that I can't keep up.)
(I looked over and saw Kotori was pouting.)
What's wrong, Kotori?

Nothing. Aren't you glad to have cute girls all over
you?
I feel like a monster or some kind of alien.
Hmph.

(Man, she's in a bad mood. I need to end it there or
she'll get completely angry.)
Uh, guys?
Hmm, but don't you think its weird?
Hm?

(I tried to stop them and their conversation took a
turn.)

Yeah. I mean you guys look good together, but
something is off.
Honestly, you guys don't seem like you're dating.
Yeah. It feels like you guys are close siblings?
What...! Th-That's not true!
(Kotori responded strongly.)
We're not siblings! It's true!
Shido and I are g-going out for real! We're dating!
Shido, say something!
Okay, okay. Don't yank me.
(I cleared my throat. Their gazes were piercing.)
I-It's true. We're dating. Right, Kotori?
Y-Yes, Shido.
Why are you getting all uncomfortable?!

I-I can't help it! It's hard to talk about this in
front of my friends! Gosh Shido, can't you be more
bold?
It's hard for me, too!

(Knowing they were Kotori's friends, I suddenly became
nervous. Their gazes turned more doubtful.)
(Th-This doesn't look good.)
Then show us proof.
Proof?

Yeah, proof that you two are dating. Like... for
example, you guys could kiss?
K-Kiss?!
Oh, that's nice!
H-Hey, wait a minute!
(Things are taking a weird turn!)
I mean, you can kiss her on the cheek or something.
Or can you not do it?
Then you guys aren't...
I-I can totally do that! It's nothing!
Hey, Kotori!
(Kotori responded before I could stop her.)

Sh-Sh-Sh-Shido, you stay out of this! I can't back
down now! Leave it all to me!
Your eyes look unfocused!

(She's totally thrown off! Honestly, I don't think she
can calm down at this rate.)
I-It's fine. It's just a peck on the cheek...
(Kotori trailed off.)
Wh-What's wrong?
P-People will see...
Huh?
(Kotori looked around with her brows furrowed.)

(It was the shopping district in broad daylight. There
were enough people walking about to begin with, but
since we made a ruckus, some were looking at us.)

(And of course, Kotori's two friends were glued to
our every move.)
H-Hey, you're shaking, Kotori.

W-Well... When you think about it, I'm out here in
broad daylight...
A-And there are a lot of people...

No... People are going to see me do something
embarrassing...

(Gosh... Look how bright red she is. She's about to
cry, yet she's acting so tough. She is a handful.)
Be kind and give her advice
Fire her up

(It's no use. I have to do something about this
situation.)
Calm down, Kotori. I'll take the lead.
R-Really?
Yeah, leave it to me. You ready? Do as I say.
O-Okay, I will.
(Good, she nodded.)

Well, first put your hand on my face, and hold it so I
won't move.
L-Like this?
Gah?!

F-F-F-First, I need to hold his face so he won't
move...!

Wait, um, Kotori-san? You don't have to put that
much power into it!
What's next? What do I do next? Hurry up, Shido.
She's not even listening!

(I thought I could hear my head making a cracking
noise. Oh no, oh no! H-How powerful could she be?!)
N-Now, stand straight! Try to reach my height.
O-Okay.
And then put your face to mine.

(Kotori was breathing heavily, and it tickled my
cheeks.)
(Slowly, slowly, her blushing face neared and―)
...Muah.
AHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHH!

(As I felt something soft, there was major squealing
around me.)
...I did it. Despite everyone watching.
R-Right.

(Kotori sounded different as she spoke, and I felt my
heart skip. But it only lasted for a second. Kotori
snapped out of it and jumped away from me.)
S-So, how's that? You convinced now?!
Yeah, totally!
I totally saw it!

(The two girls seemed excited, grabbing Kotori's hand
giddily. As they made a ruckus, I brought my hand to
my cheek.)
(It felt like Kotori's soft lips were still lingering.)
(...Man, I guess I had to take one for the team.)
D-Don't move, Shido!
Hey, don't push yourself.
(I pushed Kotori back and slumped my shoulders.)

Kotori, you won't be able to kiss me. You're still a
baby.
...What?

Hm? Did you not hear me? You're still a baby, so you
don't have the guts to kiss me, right?

This is something we can do after you mature. You're
still a wimp, so you can't do it.
WH-WH-WH-WHAT... DID YOU SAYYYY?!

(Kotori shouted as loudly as the girls did, glaring at
me.)
You sure have a big mouth, Shido!

Well. I mean, you're a child. I bet you don't know how
to kiss.

Stop calling me a baby! I know how to do it! I'm
totally gonna!
AH?! Ow, ow, ow, ow, K-Kotori! My neck!
If I do this, you won't move, right?
It feels like I'll never move again!
Bring it on!

(N-No! She's serious! I've gone too far! And my neck
won't move at all! How powerful is she?!)
You can't run now. So what do I do next?
Is this a situation where you can ask that?!

I applaud you for getting me pumped. But you've
underestimated me.

I wouldn't want my girlfriend to say such a thing to
me!
Are you some kind of evil emperor?!
Shido, brace yourself. *pant*... *pant*...

Your breathing! You're breathing heavily! Your face...
It looks wrong!
Here I go!
AHHHH!
(Kotori's kiss was a lot softer than I anticipated.)

(But that was just a split second. The next moment,
Kotori glared at her friends.)
How was that? You happy now?
Y-Yesss...
(They were both totally turned off.)
U-Um, we just remembered we had to go somewhere!
Y-Yeah, totally! I have to go now! Like right now!
E-Excuse us!
(Intimidated by Kotori's aura, they ran off.)
Phew....
(I sighed in relief and she yanked on my sleeves.)

Shido. You sure said some interesting things earlier.
We need to talk later. You'd best not run.
Ha...hahaha...

(I felt sweat trickling down my spine. It was nice to
taunt Kotori, but I wasn't thinking about what would
happen afterwards.)

Ah, this feels good. I feel like Shido will cater to
me all day today.
(God... Please give Kotori a little compassion.)
All right. We're done shopping.
Hey, Kotori? How long are you going to pout for?

(Kotori's friends acknowledged us as a couple. That
was great, but ever since they left, Kotori has been
pouting.)

What's your problem? You keep that up and it won't
be cute at all.
You were so cute when you kissed me.

(Suddenly, Kotori looked at me with a bright red
face.)

IDIOT! IDIOT! SHIDO, YOU'RE AN IDIOT! I'm never going
to do something that embarrassing ever again!
Ou! Owwww! Don't hit me! HEY!

(Kotori punched me with her small fists. I guess she
was really embarrassed kissing in front of people.
Her face was bright red.)

...I-If you want to do something like that, I'll do it
a lot when we get home...
Oh... I see...
Yeah...
(Now it was my turn to blush.)
L-Let's hurry home.
R-Right.

(She grabbed my sleeves and we began to walk awkwardly
back.)

(I thought this side of Kotori was cute, but God knows
what she'll say if I say that, so I'm going to keep this to
myself.)
